statements: DELETE FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored > 10 AND assists > 5;
DELETE FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_name LIKE 'C%' AND fouls >= 3;

DELETE FROM player_details WHERE team_name = 'Barcelona' AND position = 'Forward';

DELETE FROM team_performance WHERE team_id = 2001 AND goals_scored < 5
DELETE FROM match_results WHERE match_id = 3001 AND goals_conceded >= 3
DELETE FROM player_stats WHERE matches_played < 10 AND goals_scored = 0;
